17Continuous improvement teams 
We have implemented continuous improvement teams to study our internal 
processes to reduce waste and improve product quality and cost. By empowering 
these teams, it allows for faster response times and a timely release of innovative 
products and services. From environmental initiatives to supply chain management 
to design reviews, we are always looking for improvements that will focus on our 
4 Rs - Reduce, Reuse, Recycle and Rethink. 
• Reduce - Use less and save resources that cannot be eliminated 
• Reuse - Extend the usable life of natural, company resources by using the 
material in other applications 
• Recycle - Transform the material into another useful form after their initial 
application life and reduce landfill space for waste 
• Rethink - Reconsider a better way of doing things. Consider options to reduce 
resource and energy use as well as costs 
Renewable energy
Adtran sites in Germany (Berlin and Greifswald) have been using 100% green 
energy since 2021. In Huntsville, we participate in the Green Flex Program for 
large-scale wind generation through our purchase of 9,000 MWh. This is an 
increase from 3,000 MWh from 2021. The Green Flex Program is 100% wind 
energy sourced from Illinois, Iowa, and Kansas and is delivered to the Tennessee 
Valley. This program is Green Energy® Certified which guarantees renewable 
generation coverage for all purchased Renewable Energy Credits (REC).
By purchasing RECs, we help to reduce the impact of electricity consumption by 
using renewable energy to replace 10% or one month of our electricity.
